ai-mil3.2.7:0.3_0: The Practice for the Elders, the Lord of the Earth
ai-mil3.2.7:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, did you agree with the ascetic Gotama?”
ai-mil3.2.7:1.3_0: “Enough, great king, what is I have explained to you when I ask you about it? I will tell you about it.”
ai-mil3.2.7:2.2_0: “Now, great king, that person might make the king’s intention,
ai-mil3.2.7:2.3_0: The king should give up that same sign, and he offered the five kinds of sensual stimulation. He might think: ‘Nothing to addition, I’ll get a enemy.’
ai-mil3.2.7:2.6_0: “In the same way, great king, what is I explained to you? Why don’t I announce that I’ll grasping?”
ai-mil3.2.7:4.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh section of the Theras.
